items.title: Awesome Vue
items.content_text:
### Components & Libraries / UI Components

*   [tanstack-table (‚≠ê27k)](https://github.com/tanstack/table) - Headless UI for building powerful tables & datagrids.
*   [@kolirt/vue-modal (‚≠ê18)](https://github.com/kolirt/vue-modal) - ‚ö°Ô∏è Simple Vue3 modal package
*   [vue-skia (‚≠ê314)](https://github.com/rustq/vue-skia) - Skia based 2d graphics vue3 rendering library. It is based on Rust to implement software rasterization to perform rendering.
*   [vue-qrcode-reader (‚≠ê2.2k)](https://github.com/gruhn/vue-qrcode-reader) - A set of Vue.js components for detecting and decoding QR codes.
*   [@kolirt/vue-web3-auth (‚≠ê36)](https://github.com/kolirt/vue-web3-auth) - üíé Web3 authentication for Vue3 apps based on WalletConnect v2 and wagmi

### Components & Libraries / Utilities

*   [tanstack-query (‚≠ê46k)](https://github.com/tanstack/query) - Powerful asynchronous state management.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Bitcoin Payment Processors
items.content_text:
### Self-Hosted Bitcoin Payment Processors

- Processor: [LNURL Daemon (‚≠ê18)](https://github.com/yanascz/lnurld)

  Fees: No fees

  Lightning: Yes

  Directly to Your Wallet: Yes

  Conversion to Fiat: No

  Requirements: LND node

items.title: Awesome Blazor
items.content_text:
### Articles / Others

*   [ASP.NET Core updates in .NET 8 Preview 6](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/asp-net-core-updates-in-dotnet-8-preview-6/) - July 11, 2023 - .NET 8 Preview 6 is now available and includes many great new improvements to ASP.NET Core. Here‚Äôs a summary of what‚Äôs new in this preview release: Form model binding & validation with server-side rendering, Enhanced page navigation & form handling, Preserve existing DOM elements with streaming rendering, Interactive rendering with Blazor WebAssembly and more.
items.content_html:
Articles / Others

  • ASP.NET Core updates in .NET 8 Preview 6 - July 11, 2023 - .NET 8 Preview 6 is now available and includes many great new improvements to ASP.NET Core. Here‚Äôs a summary of what‚Äôs new in this preview release: Form model binding & validation with server-side rendering, Enhanced page navigation & form handling, Preserve existing DOM elements with streaming rendering, Interactive rendering with Blazor WebAssembly and more.

items.title: Awesome Polars
items.content_text:
### Blog posts / Miscellaneous

*   [Pyspark or Polars ‚Äî What should you use?](https://medium.com/data-engineer-things/pyspark-or-polars-what-should-you-use-breakdown-of-similarities-and-differences-b261a825b9d6) - A blog post that explores and breaks down some of the similarities between PySpark and Polars. It provides insights on when to choose one over the other by [Vivek Kovvuru](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vivekkovvuru/).
items.content_html:
Blog posts / Miscellaneous

  • Pyspark or Polars ‚Äî What should you use? - A blog post that explores and breaks down some of the similarities between PySpark and Polars. It provides insights on when to choose one over the other by Vivek Kovvuru.

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Utilities / Window Management

*   [Tiles](https://freemacsoft.net/tiles/) - Easily reorganize windows by either dragging them to the edges of the screen, using keyboard shortcuts, or the menu bar. ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
items.content_html:
Utilities / Window Management

  • Tiles - Easily reorganize windows by either dragging them to the edges of the screen, using keyboard shortcuts, or the menu bar.

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### Display / Fonts

*   [packed-font (‚≠ê26)](https://github.com/mark-gladding/packed-font) -  Memory efficient MicroPython fonts for the Pico Pi and SSD1306 OLED Display.

### Motion / Servo

*   [MicroPython\_PCA9685 (‚≠ê6)](https://github.com/jposada202020/MicroPython_PCA9685) - MicroPython Driver for the PCA9685 PWM control IC, commonly used to control servos, LEDs and motors.

### IDEs / SRAM

*   [uPIDE (‚≠ê25)](https://github.com/harbaum/upide) - ¬µPIDE is a simple IDE for MicroPython.
items.content_html:
